Room.Name: Pits of Doom - Yellow Level
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Yellow Level in the Pits of Doom Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Pits of Doom are constructed into three levels of difficulty, Yellow being the easiest, if there is such a thing, and Red being the most difficult. To live up to its name, as you descend down the levels of the Pits, the danger increases. It is rumored that there is a fourth level below Red, but no one has ever survived to verify that rumor.
